channel.title: registration on Zettelkasten
channel.description: Recent content in registration on Zettelkasten

item.title: Registration
item.description: Aligning two points, each in different spaces respectively, together Examples aligning an endoscope coordinate frame to CT data (based on a similarity metric between endoscopic image and CT image) – from https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25991876/ match virtual surface to corresponding endoscopic video – https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/958638 Parent: SofaPython Index allows a matching between deformable surfaces finds spatial transformations to align two point sets or two meshes done based on: either target surfaces (ClosestPointRegistrationForceField , RegistrationContactForceField) or target images (IntensityProfileRegistrationForceField), which requires the use of the image plugin
